definition: a legendary tree that sheds coins when shaken/a source of easy money (idiom)
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Netease is happy, ding Lei laughs very aglitter , cuddle of tremendous a ready source of money is in the bosom.
sentences.chinese: 網易樂了，丁磊笑得很燦爛，巨大的搖錢樹摟在懷中。

sentences.english: The new movie theater that they just opened by campus is a real cash cow.
sentences.chinese: 學校旁邊新開的電影院真是個搖錢樹啊。

sentences.english: But the biggest cash cow is lower-division undergraduate education.
sentences.chinese: 但是最大的搖錢樹卻是層次較低的本科生教育。

sentences.english: The pattern of a money tree offered the condition for its commercialization.
sentences.chinese: 搖錢樹的格套化爲它的商品化提供了條件。

sentences.english: That said, don't treat your job just as a cash-cow, either.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，不要把你的工作當做搖錢樹。

sentences.english: Digital content has already proved itself to be a money-spinner for Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 事實證明，數字內容是亞馬遜的搖錢樹。

sentences.english: So even your mistakes can be monetized.
sentences.chinese: 所以，甚至是你所犯的錯誤也可以作爲你的搖錢樹。

sentences.english: The little girl is future shaking Qian Shu, is her wish.
sentences.chinese: 那小小的女兒是將來的搖錢樹，是她的希望。

sentences.english: The new movie theater these you only opened by campus is a ture cash cow.
sentences.chinese: 學府旁邊新開的那家影片院真是個搖錢樹。

sentences.english: Zhangjiajie hopes to  capitalise on that fame.
sentences.chinese: 張家界希望能利用這棵搖錢樹。

sentences.english: This practice is popularly known in the online gaming community as gold farming.
sentences.chinese: 在網絡遊戲社區中，這種做法被普遍視爲是棵搖錢樹。

sentences.english: Student files are a proven moneymaker for corrupt state workers.
sentences.chinese: 學生的檔案就是腐敗官員們的一個搖錢樹。

sentences.english: Diligence is a money-spinner, thrifty is the cornucopia.
sentences.chinese: 勤是搖錢樹，儉是聚寶盆。

definition: door knocker (in the shape of a ring)
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
having wealth equivalent to that of an entire nation (idiom)/extremely wealthy
to conspire with sb/to plot/a conspirator/a partner in crime/an accomplice
